name: Dynamics Venture Capital Fund
overview:

The Dynamics Venture Capital Fund has emerged in July 2005 by an MBO of the management team from the RWE Dynamics Venture Capital Fund. The Corporate Venture Capital Fund of RWE AG was established in 2001.

Even the Dynamics Venture Fund will work closely in future with the operating units of RWE to evaluate innovative technology companies and encouraged.
